name: Kevinleedev.github.io
tagline: My page who's name is Kevin Li
body:
# Hey you guys!
## I am kevin what you are seeing is my page on github.

## 4/3/2014
I committed my first project on github as you can find [policecar](https://github.com/kevinleedev/policecar-css3-html5-canvas)

## I am a java developer with great interests in frontend technology.
Like css3,javascript as well as nodejs which is so powerful,that a great thing I think.As I said,I did what I committed today - the policecar which is very simple but good.I will keep on reasearching on frontend.

## Maybe you want to know what I have done as I give you bellow:

## I'm still a java developer who loves open source for his life.

### I have go thrught several projects,take some for example.
### GCS(guitar center scheduler) which is a system of guitarcenter.com.
GCS is used to create lesson for gc.com registered users,like guitar lesson,base lesson etc.However,it's not over,it's not a huge project but lots of technologys in it.We build the dev environment with spring mvc,spring3 and hibernate4 as backend env,I thought spring mvc a fatanstic framework which is simple but useful and transaction of hibernate is never a weakness in this version and the annotation of spring always my favorite which makes code beautiful.Also,the focus is what we used of frontend in this project,requirejs,backbone,jquery are used to make gcs works perfectly.the javascript OOD is well understood in this practice.Since backbone makes post or get request simple thanks to it's 'model' and I like the way it binds event to html element.

### I think this project could not make you understand what I get in my development time,but things may change if you follow my github.

thanks, :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
